title: Analyze Drill Bit Performance
description: After drilling a well section, an engineer analyzes the performance of the drill bit to decide if it can be used again or should be replaced.

tasks.description: Retrieve the drilling data for the section, including rate of penetration (ROP), weight on bit (WOB), and hours on the bit.
tasks.expected_outcome: All relevant performance data for the bit run is compiled.

tasks.description: Input the dull grading code from the visual inspection of the bit after it was pulled out of the hole.
tasks.expected_outcome: The bit's condition is logged in the system.

tasks.description: Compare the bit's performance and condition against benchmarks to make a run/pull/repair decision.
tasks.expected_outcome: A recommendation is made to 'pull' the bit and replace it for the next section.
